title: Die Arche
html:
Die Arche

1919 film

Die Arche
Directed byRichard Oswald
Written by
  • Robert Liebmann
  • Richard Oswald
  • Werner Scheff
Starring
  • Leo Connard
  • Eva Speyer
CinematographyKarl Freund
Production
company
Richard-Oswald-Produktion

Running time
70 minutes
CountryWeimar Republic
Languages

  • German intertitles

Die Arche (The Ark) is a 1919 silent science fiction film starring Leo Connard and directed by Richard Oswald. It is a two-part German epic based upon a novel by Werner Scheff. It follows the story of a near future in which civilization has been destroyed.

Cast[edit]

  • Leo Connard as Ernst Pogge, Großreeder
  • Eva Speyer as Helga, Ernsts Tochter
  • Georg H. Schnell as Klaus Donken, Kapitän
  • Oevid Molander as Walter Fahr, Ingenieur
  • Eugen Klöpfer as Volkert, Steuermann
  • Guido Herzfeld as Dr. Milius, Arzt
  • Kissa von Sievers as Helgas Zofe
  • Emil Lind as Keigo Soluma, Professor der Astronomie

References[edit]

  • Wingrove, David (1985). Science Fiction Film Source Book. Harlow: Longman. ISBN 978-0-582-89310-8.
